name: Gravity Gear (Rockett, AdaErika, Riffael, LaraSilvestris, Itchy_Monni)
name_original: Gravity Gear (Rockett, AdaErika, Riffael, LaraSilvestris, Itchy_Monni)
description:
The evil Galactic Overlord is ready for you. This showdown has been coming for a long time. Secure the peace for good by taking down the Overlord once and for all.

Equipped with you blaster and your lightning speed, you are the galaxy's best bet to end this fight. Dodge attacks and collect health packs to survive the Overlord's attacks. But be careful, the Overlord has plenty of tricks up their mechanical sleeves...

Controls:

WASD - movement

Mouse 1 - shoot blaster

Left Shift - dash

Esc - pause the game

Created as a project of the Tampere University of Applied Sciences GameCamp 2021 by students. Feedback is very welcome!

Team:

Eero Salmi: Programming, Audio, Level Design

Laura Huovinen: Programming 

Jirko Haapapuro: Animation, Graphic Design, Character Design, Post FX

Juho Mansikka: Particle VFX

Ada Ikonen: Graphic Design, Character Design
